title: Margarita
description: The Margarita is a classic and popular cocktail that's made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, and is served with a salt rim. It's a refreshing and tangy drink that's perfect for sipping on a hot summer day or for enjoying alongside Mexican cuisine.

title: Paloma
description: The Paloma is a refreshing and easy-to-make cocktail that's popular in Mexico. It's made with tequila, grapefruit soda, and lime juice, and is garnished with a salt rim and a wedge of fresh lime, giving it a tangy and slightly sweet flavor.

title: Wine

title: Long Island Iced Tea
description: The Long Island Iced Tea is a potent and refreshing cocktail that's made with vodka, tequila, rum, gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and cola. Its unique blend of spirits and citrus creates a smooth and flavorful drink that's perfect for those who like their cocktails on the stronger side.

title: Moscow Mule
description: The Moscow Mule is a vodka-based cocktail that's served in a copper mug, giving it a distinct and eye-catching appearance. Its simple yet delicious recipe includes ginger beer, lime juice, and vodka, making it a refreshing and flavorful choice for any occasion.

title: Mojito
description: The Mojito is a classic Cuban cocktail that has gained popularity worldwide. It's made with rum, lime juice, sugar, mint leaves, and soda water, and its sweet and refreshing flavor makes it a perfect choice for a hot summer day.

title: Sangria
description: Sangria is a refreshing and fruity wine-based cocktail that originated in Spain. It's made with red or white wine, fresh fruits, juices, and a splash of brandy, and is perfect for sipping on warm summer evenings or for sharing with friends over a delicious meal.

title: Old Fashioned
description: The Old Fashioned is a timeless and iconic cocktail that features a smooth blend of bourbon or rye whiskey, muddled sugar, bitters, and a citrus twist. It's a perfect choice for those who appreciate classic cocktails and enjoy a sophisticated and flavorful drink.
